Solomon King is a New Zealand rugby union player who plays for the New Zealand Sevens team.
Career highlights
*NZ Sevens 2006 - 2011
*chiefs WTG 2009
*New Zealand U21 2006
*North Harbour NPC 2011
*Bay of Plenty NPC 2006, 2010
*Bay of Plenty Development 2003 - 2006
References
